snippet.title: Outer Terror - Worldwide Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
CHECK-OUT OUTER TERROR: https://store.voxpopgames.com/store/685

OUTER TERROR is an all-new minimalist bullet-hell, with advanced rogue-lite elements.

Each player (1 or 2 players Co-Op) chooses from 10 survivors with various weapons and skills to battle against unending waves of otherworldly creatures. By battling and leveling up, the player will be able to stack new weapons and powers until their attacks fill the screen!

Each of the game’s five unique stories features massive maps full of other survivors, treasures, and massive boss encounters. Can you usurp the crying god?

https://linktr.ee/voxpopgames
